## FunctionCallNode.getSerializationCls() method

Gets the serialization descriptor for this node type

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getSerializationCls(manager: ResourceManager): SerializableClass;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

manager


</td><td>

[ResourceManager](doc/markdown/./scene.resourcemanager.md)


</td><td>

The serialization manager for loading blueprints


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[SerializableClass](doc/markdown/./scene.serializableclass.md)

Serialization class descriptor

## Remarks

Uses a custom createFunc to asynchronously load the function blueprint from the file system. The initialization parameter is the blueprint path.
